atk-s0305a2:3_0: 367. Satipaṭṭhānasaṁyuttassa paṭhame ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā
atk-s0305a2:3_1: ropite ambavane. Taṁ kira tassā uyyānaṁ ahosi. Sā satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pasannacittā
atk-s0305a2:3_2: tattha vihāraṁ kāretvā tathāgatassa niyyātesi. Taṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ. Ekāyanvāyanti
atk-s0305a2:3_3: ekāyano ayaṁ. Tattha ekāyanoti ekamaggo. Maggassa hi –
atk-s0305a2:5: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo’’ti. (cūḷani. pārāyanatthutigāthāniddeso 101) –
atk-s0305a2:6_0: Bahūni nāmāni. Svāyaṁ idha ayananāmena vutto. Tasmā ekāyanvāyaṁ, bhikkhave, maggoti
atk-s0305a2:6_1: ettha ekamaggo. Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a2:6_2: Maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena ca.
atk-s0305a2:7_0: Sattānaṁ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi saṁkiliṭṭhacittānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:7_1: sattānaṁ visuddhatthāya. Sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca
atk-s0305a2:7_2: samatikkamāya, pahānāyāti attho. Dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa
atk-s0305a2:7_3: ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ñāyassa
atk-s0305a2:7_4: adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, tassa adhigamāya pattiyāti vuttaṁ
atk-s0305a2:7_5: hoti. Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya
atk-s0305a2:7_6: saṁvattati . Tenāha ‘‘ñāyassa adhigamāyā’’ti. Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā
atk-s0305a2:7_7: nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya, attapaccakkhāyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:7_8: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṁ sādheti. Tenāha ‘‘nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā’’ti.
atk-s0305a2:8_0: Evaṁ bhagavatā sattahi padehi ekāyanamaggassa vaṇṇo bhāsito, so kasmāti ce? Bhikkhūnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:8_1: ussāhajananatthaṁ. Vaṇṇabhāsanañhi sutvā te bhikkhū – ‘‘ayaṁ kira maggo hadayasantāpabhūtaṁ
atk-s0305a2:8_2: sokaṁ, vācāvippalāpabhūtaṁ paridevaṁ, kāyikaasātabhūtaṁ dukkhaṁ, cetasikaasātabhūtaṁ
atk-s0305a2:8_3: domanassanti cattāro upaddave harati. Visuddhiṁ, ñāyaṁ, nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī’’ti
atk-s0305a2:8_4: ussāhajātā imaṁ desanaṁ uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ, dhāretabbaṁ, imañca maggaṁ
atk-s0305a2:8_5: bhāvetabbaṁ maññissanti. Iti tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ vaṇṇaṁ abhāsi kambalavāṇijādayo
atk-s0305a2:9_0: Yadidanti nipāto, ye imeti ayamassa attho. Cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Tena ‘‘na
atk-s0305a2:9_1: tato heṭṭhā, na uddha’’nti satipaṭṭhānaparicchedaṁ dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti tayo satipaṭṭhānā
atk-s0305a2:9_2: satigocaropi, tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0305a2:9_3: ‘‘Catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi taṁ suṇātha.
atk-s0305a2:9_4: Ko ca, bhikkhave, kāyassa samudayo? Āharasamudayā kāyasamudayo’’tiādīsu (saṁ. ni.
atk-s0305a2:9_5: 5.408) hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vutto. Tathā ‘‘kāyo upaṭṭhānaṁ, no sati, sati
atk-s0305a2:9_6: upaṭṭhānañceva sati cā’’tiādīsupi (paṭi. ma. 2.35). Tassa attho – patiṭṭhāti asminti
atk-s0305a2:9_7: paṭṭhānaṁ. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ. Padhānaṁ ṭhānanti
atk-s0305a2:9_8: vā paṭṭhānaṁ. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānaṁ hatthiṭṭhānaassaṭṭhānādīni viya.
atk-s0305a2:10_0: ‘‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā, yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’’ti
atk-s0305a2:10_1: (ma. ni. 3.311) ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā
atk-s0305a2:10_2: satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Tassattho – paṭṭhapetabbato paṭṭhānaṁ, pavattayitabbatoti
atk-s0305a2:10_3: attho. Kena paṭṭhapetabboti? Satiyā. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṁ satipaṭṭhānanti.
atk-s0305a2:11_0: ‘‘Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī’’tiādīsu (ma.
atk-s0305a2:11_1: ni. 3.147; saṁ. ni. 5.989) pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā. Tassattho – patiṭṭhātīti
atk-s0305a2:11_2: paṭṭhānaṁ, upaṭṭhāti okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho. Satiyeva paṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:11_3: satipaṭṭhānaṁ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena sati, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānaṁ, iti sati ca
atk-s0305a2:12_0: Yadi evaṁ kasmā ‘‘satipaṭṭhānā’’ti bahuvacanaṁ katanti? Satīnaṁ bahuttā. Ārammaṇabhedena
atk-s0305a2:12_1: hi bahukā satiyo. Atha ‘‘maggo’’ti kasmā ekavacananti? Magganaṭṭhena ekattā. Catassopi
atk-s0305a2:12_2: hi etā satiyo magganaṭṭhena ekattaṁ gacchanti. Vutañhetaṁ ‘‘maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo?
atk-s0305a2:12_3: Nibbānamagganaṭṭhena, nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena cā’’ti. Catassopi cetā aparabhāge
atk-s0305a2:12_4: kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṁ sādhayamānā nibbānaṁ gacchanti, ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi
atk-s0305a2:12_5: maggiyantīti tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā. Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti.
atk-s0305a2:13_0: Katame cattāroti kathetukamyatāpucchā. Kāyeti rūpakāye. Kāyānupassīti kāyaṁ anupassanasīlo,
atk-s0305a2:13_1: kāyaṁ vā anupassamāno. Ayañhi bhikkhu imaṁ kāyaṁ aniccānupassanādīnaṁ sattannaṁ anupassanānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:13_2: vasena aniccato anupassati, no niccato, dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato, anattato
atk-s0305a2:13_3: anupassati, no attato, nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no rajjati, nirodheti,
atk-s0305a2:13_4: no samudeti, paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. So taṁ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṁ
atk-s0305a2:13_5: pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasaññaṁ pajahati , anattato anupassanto attasaññaṁ
atk-s0305a2:13_6: pajahati, nibbindanto nandiṁ pajahati, virajjanto rāgaṁ pajahati, nirodhento samudayaṁ
atk-s0305a2:14_0: Viharatīti irīyati. Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapatīti ātāpo, vīriyassetaṁ nāmaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:14_1: Ātāpo assa atthīti ātāpī. Sampajānoti sampajaññasaṅkhātena ñāṇena samannāgato. Satimāti
atk-s0305a2:14_2: kāyapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṁ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṁ pariggahetvā
atk-s0305a2:14_3: paññāya anupassati. Na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi, tenevāha ‘‘satiñca
atk-s0305a2:14_4: khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṁ vadāmī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.234). Tasmā ettha ‘‘kāye
atk-s0305a2:14_5: kāyānupassī viharatī’’ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ hoti. Atha vā
atk-s0305a2:14_6: yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti, asampajāno upāyapariggahe anupāyaparivajjane
atk-s0305a2:14_7: ca sammuyhati, muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti, tenassa
atk-s0305a2:14_8: taṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ na sampajjati. Tasmā yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ānubhāvena taṁ sampajjati,
atk-s0305a2:14_9: tesaṁ dassanatthaṁ ‘‘ātāpī sampajāno satimā’’ti idaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:15_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ sampayogaṅgañjassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṁ dassetuṁ
atk-s0305a2:15_1: vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṁ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
atk-s0305a2:15_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi tasmiṁyeva kāye. Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti
atk-s0305a2:15_3: adhippeto. Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṁ pahīyati, vedanādīsupi
atk-s0305a2:15_4: pahīyati eva. Tasmā ‘‘pañcapi upādānakkhandhā loko’’ti vibhaṅge (vibha. 362) vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:15_5: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ atthuddhāranayenetaṁ vuttaṁ. Yaṁ panāha ‘‘tattha
atk-s0305a2:15_6: katamo loko, sveva kāyo loko’’ti, ayamevettha attho. Tasmiṁ loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ
atk-s0305a2:16_0: Vedanāsūti ettha tisso vedanā, tā ca lokiyā eva, cittampi lokiyaṁ, tathā dhammā.
atk-s0305a2:16_1: Yathā pana vedanā anupassitabbā, tathā anupassanto esa vedanānupassīti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:16_2: Esa nayo cittadhammesu. Kathañca vedanā anupassitabbāti? Sukhā tāva vedanā dukkhato,
atk-s0305a2:19: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī’’ti.
atk-s0305a2:20_0: Sabbā eva cetā dukkhātipi anupassitabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘yaṁkiñci vedayitaṁ, sabbaṁ
atk-s0305a2:20_1: taṁ dukkhasminti vadāmī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 4.259). Sukhadukkhatopi ca anupassitabbā, yathāha
atk-s0305a2:20_2: – ‘‘sukhā kho, āvuso visākha, vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.465)
atk-s0305a2:21_1: aniccādianupassanānaṁ sarāgādīnañca bhedānaṁ vasena anupassitabbaṁ. Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:21_3: pabhedānaṁ vasena anupassitabbā. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
atk-s0305a2:21_4: pana dīghamajjhimaṭṭhakathāsu (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.373 ādayo; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.105 ādayo)
atk-s0305a2:23_0: 368. Dutiye satoti kāyādianupassanāsatiyā samannāgato. Sampajānoti catusampajaññapaññāya
atk-s0305a2:23_1: samannāgato. Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha abhikkantaṁ vuccati gamanaṁ, paṭikkantaṁ
atk-s0305a2:23_2: nivattanaṁ, tadubhayampi catūsu iriyāpathesu labbhati. Gamane tāva purato kāyaṁ abhiharanto
atk-s0305a2:23_3: abhikkamati nāma, paṭinivattanto paṭikkamati nāma. Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṁ purato
atk-s0305a2:23_4: onamanto abhikkamati nāma, pacchato apanāmento paṭikkamati nāma. Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova
atk-s0305a2:23_5: āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṁsaranto abhikkamati nāma, pacchimaaṅgappadesaṁ paccāsaṁsaranto
atk-s0305a2:24: Sampajānakārī hotīti sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī. So hi abhikkantādīsu sampajaññaṁ karoteva, na katthaci sampajaññavirahito hoti.
atk-s0305a2:25_1: catubbidhaṁ sampajaññaṁ. Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā ‘‘kiṁ
atk-s0305a2:25_2: nu me ettha gatena attho atthi, natthī’’ti atthānatthaṁ pariggaṇhitvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:25_4: dhammato vaḍḍhi . Cetiyaṁ disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṁ, saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:25_5: pītiṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti. Mahāvihārasmiñhi dakkhiṇadvāre
atk-s0305a2:25_6: ṭhatvā mahācetiyaṁ olokentā tiṁsasahassabhikkhū arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu, tathā pacchimadvāre
atk-s0305a2:25_7: uttaradvāre pācīnadvāre ca, tathā pañhamaṇḍapaṭṭhāne abhayavāpipāḷiyaṁ, thūpārāmadvāre
atk-s0305a2:26_0: Mahāariyavaṁsabhāṇakatthero panāha ‘‘kiṁ tumhe vadatha, mahācetiyassa samantā kucchivedikāya
atk-s0305a2:26_1: heṭṭhimabhāgato paṭṭhāya paññāyanaṭṭhāne yattha yattha dve pādā sakkā honti samaṁ
atk-s0305a2:26_2: patiṭṭhāpetuṁ, tattha tattha ekapaduddhāre tiṁsatiṁsa bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṁ
atk-s0305a2:26_3: pāpuṇiṁsūti sakkā vatu’’nti . Aparo pana mahāthero āha – ‘‘mahācetiyatale ākiṇṇavālikāya
atk-s0305a2:26_4: bahutarā bhikkhū arahattaṁ pattā’’ti. There disvā tesaṁ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:26_5: disvā tattha paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a2:26_6: Tasmā etesaṁ dassanaṁ sātthaṁ. Keci pana – ‘‘āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva, taṁ nissāya
atk-s0305a2:27_0: Tasmiṁ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:27_1: Seyyathidaṁ? Cetiyadassanaṁ tāva sātthaṁ. Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare
atk-s0305a2:27_2: parisā sannipatanti, attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni
atk-s0305a2:27_3: viya sañcaranti. Tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe paṭigho, asamapekkhane
atk-s0305a2:27_4: moho uppajjati, kāyasaṁsagge kāyasaṁsaggāpattiṁ āpajjati, jīvitabrahmacariyānaṁ vā
atk-s0305a2:27_5: antarāyo ca hoti. Evaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ asappāyaṁ hoti, vuttappakāraantarāyābhāve sappāyaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:27_6: Saṅghadassanampi sātthaṁ. Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṁ kāretvā sabbarattiṁ dhammassavanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:27_7: kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti, evaṁ taṁ
atk-s0305a2:27_8: ṭhānaṁ asappāyaṁ, antarāyābhāve sappāyaṁ. Mahāparivārānaṁ therānaṁ dassanepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0305a2:28_0: Asubhadassanampi sātthaṁ. Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṁ vatthu – eko kira daharabhikkhu
atk-s0305a2:28_1: sāmaṇeraṁ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato. Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto
atk-s0305a2:28_2: asubhaṁ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṁ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṁ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0305a2:28_3: tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Daharo
atk-s0305a2:28_4: taṁ apassanto ‘‘sāmaṇerā’’ti pakkosi . So – ‘‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā
atk-s0305a2:28_5: saddhiṁ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā, aññasmimpi divase uparivisesaṁ nibbattessāmī’’ti
atk-s0305a2:28_6: cintetvā ‘‘kiṁ, bhante,’’ti paṭivacanaṁ adāsi. ‘‘Ehī’’ti vutte ekavacaneneva āgantvā
atk-s0305a2:28_7: – ‘‘bhante, iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṁ puratthābhimukhā hutvā
atk-s0305a2:28_8: olokethā’’ti āha. So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi. Evaṁ ekaṁ asubhaṁ dvinnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:28_9: janānaṁ atthāya jātaṁ. Evaṁ sātthampi panetaṁ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṁ asappāyaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:28_10: mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṁ, sabhāgameva sappāyanti evaṁ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:29_0: Evaṁ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṁsakammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucikaṁ
atk-s0305a2:29_1: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṁ gocaraṁ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṁ gahetvāva gamanaṁ gocarasampajaññaṁ nāma.
atk-s0305a2:30_0: Tassāvibhāvatthaṁ idaṁ catukkaṁ veditabbaṁ – idhekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0305a2:30_1: ekacco paccāharati na harati, ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati, ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca.
atk-s0305a2:31_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhetvā
atk-s0305a2:31_1: tathā rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ majjhimayāme seyyaṁ kappetvā, pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi
atk-s0305a2:31_2: vītināmetvā, pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṁ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṁ āsiñcitvā
atk-s0305a2:31_3: pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni samādāya vattati.
atk-s0305a2:31_4: So sarīraparikammaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṁ gāhāpento
atk-s0305a2:31_6: senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:31_7: hoti, taṁ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ pavisati. Aññaṁ ce kammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti, sopānapādamūle
atk-s0305a2:31_8: ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṁ viya taṁ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:31_9: āruyha mahantaṁ cetiyaṁ ce, tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:31_10: khuddakaṁ ce, tatheva padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ. Cetiyaṁ vanditvā
atk-s0305a2:31_11: bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṁ dassetvā bodhi
atk-s0305a2:31_12: vanditabbā. So evaṁ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṁ
atk-s0305a2:31_13: hatthena gaṇhanto viya nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-s0305a2:32_0: Atha naṁ manussā disvā ‘‘ayyo no āgato’’ti paccuggantvā pattaṁ gahetvā āsanasālāya
atk-s0305a2:32_1: vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṁ datvā yāva bhattaṁ na niṭṭhāti, tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā
atk-s0305a2:32_2: purato nisīditvā pañhaṁ vā pucchanti, dhammaṁ vā sotukāmā honti. Sacepi na kathāpenti,
atk-s0305a2:32_3: janasaṅgahaṇatthaṁ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti. Dhammakathā
atk-s0305a2:32_4: hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṁ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-s0305a2:32_5: āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṁ katvā nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato
atk-s0305a2:32_6: nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṁ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0305a2:33_0: Atha naṁ puretaraṁ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā
atk-s0305a2:33_1: paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti. Porāṇakabhikkhū kira na ‘‘amhākaṁ upajjhāyo
atk-s0305a2:33_2: ācariyo’’ti mukhaṁ oloketvā vattaṁ karonti, sampattaparicchedeneva karonti. Te taṁ
atk-s0305a2:33_3: pucchanti – ‘‘bhante, ete manussā tumhākaṁ kiṁ honti, mātipakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhato’’ti?
atk-s0305a2:33_4: Kiṁ disvā pucchathāti? Tumhesu etesaṁ pemaṁ bahumānanti. ‘‘Āvuso, yaṁ mātāpitūhipi
atk-s0305a2:33_5: dukkarataraṁ, taṁ ete amhākaṁ karonti, pattacīvarampi no etesaṁ santakameva, etesaṁ
atk-s0305a2:33_6: ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṁ, na chātake chātakaṁ jānāma, edisā nāma amhākaṁ upakārino
atk-s0305a2:33_7: natthī’’ti tesaṁ guṇe kathayanto gacchati. Ayaṁ vuccati harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0305a2:34_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṁ vattapaṭipattiṁ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0305a2:34_1: anupādiṇṇakaṁ muñcitvā upādiṇṇakaṁ gaṇhāti, sarīrato sedā muccanti, kammaṭṭhānavīthiṁ
atk-s0305a2:34_2: nārohati, so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṁ vanditvā gorūpānaṁ nikkhamanavelāyameva
atk-s0305a2:34_3: gāmaṁ yāgubhikkhāya pavisitvā yāguṁ labhitvā āsanasālaṁ gantvā pivati. Athassa dvittikkhattuṁ
atk-s0305a2:34_4: ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādiṇṇakaṁ muñcitvā anupādiṇṇakaṁ gaṇhāti, ghaṭasatena
atk-s0305a2:34_5: nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṁ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṁ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0305a2:34_6: pattañca mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya
atk-s0305a2:34_7: caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ upaṭṭhahamānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:34_8: kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva āgacchati. Ayaṁ vuccati paccāharati na haratīti. Edisā ca
atk-s0305a2:34_9: bhikkhū yāguṁ pivitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṁ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṁ
atk-s0305a2:34_10: vītivattā. Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṁ na taṁ āsanamatthi, yattha
atk-s0305a2:34_11: yāguṁ pivitvā arahattaṁ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0305a2:35_0: Yo pana pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro, sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetovinibandhabaddhacitto
atk-s0305a2:35_1: viharanto ‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṁ nāma atthī’’tipi saññaṁ akatvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena
atk-s0305a2:35_2: gihisaṁsaggena saṁsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati. Ayaṁ vuccati
atk-s0305a2:36_0: Yo panāyaṁ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto, so gatapaccāgatikavattavasena veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:36_1: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṁsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi
atk-s0305a2:36_2: satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṁ katvā viharanti ‘‘āvuso, tumhe na iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā,
atk-s0305a2:36_3: na jīvikāpakatā pabbajitā, dukkhā muccitukāmā panettha pabbajitā, tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṁ
atk-s0305a2:36_4: gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne, nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilesaṁ sayaneyeva niggaṇhathā’’ti.
atk-s0305a2:36_5: Te evaṁ katikavattaṁ katvā bhikkhācāraṁ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-s0305a2:36_6: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-s0305a2:36_7: kileso uppajjati, tattheva naṁ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati. Athassa pacchato
atk-s0305a2:36_8: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati, so ‘‘ayaṁ bhikkhu tuyhaṁ uppannavitakkaṁ jānāti, ananucchavikaṁ
atk-s0305a2:36_9: te eta’’nti attānaṁ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṁ okkamati,
atk-s0305a2:36_10: tathā asakkonto nisīdatīti so eva nayo. Ariyabhūmiṁ okkamituṁ asakkontopi, taṁ kilesaṁ
atk-s0305a2:36_11: vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova gacchati, na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena cittena
atk-s0305a2:36_12: pādaṁ uddharati. Uddharati ce, paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaṁyeva eti ālindakavāsī
atk-s0305a2:37_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento eva vihāsi. Manussāpi sudaṁ
atk-s0305a2:37_1: antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṁ tathā gacchantaṁ
atk-s0305a2:37_2: disvā – ‘‘ayaṁ thero punappunaṁ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṁ nu kho maggamūḷho, udāhu
atk-s0305a2:37_3: kiñci pamuṭṭho’’ti samullapanti. So taṁ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṁ
atk-s0305a2:37_4: karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ
atk-s0305a2:37_5: adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṁ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi. Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca
atk-s0305a2:37_6: devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṁ āgamaṁsu. Tañca obhāsaṁ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero
atk-s0305a2:37_7: taṁ dutiyadivase pucchi – ‘‘rattibhāge āyasmato santike obhāso ahosi, kiṁ so obhāso’’ti?
atk-s0305a2:37_8: Thero vikkhepaṁ karonto ‘‘obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti, maṇiobhāsopī’’ti evamādimāha.
atk-s0305a2:37_9: Tato ‘‘paṭicchādetha tumhe’’ti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0305a2:38_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsīmahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento
atk-s0305a2:38_1: paṭhamaṁ tāva ‘‘bhagavato mahāpadhānaṁ pūjessāmī’’ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-s0305a2:38_2: adhiṭṭhāsi. Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūretvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. So
atk-s0305a2:38_3: kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto
atk-s0305a2:38_4: gāmasamīpaṁ gantvā ‘‘gāvī nu pabbajito nū’’ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṁ pārupitvā
atk-s0305a2:38_5: kacchakarakato udakena pattaṁ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ karoti. Kiṁ kāraṇā? ‘‘Mā me
atk-s0305a2:38_6: bhikkhaṁ dātuṁ vā vandituṁ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo
atk-s0305a2:38_7: ahosī’’ti ‘‘ajja, bhante, katimī’’ti divasaṁ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṁ vā pañhaṁ vā pucchito
atk-s0305a2:38_8: pana udakaṁ gilitvā āroceti. Sace divasādipucchakā na honti, nikkhamanavelāyaṁ gāmadvāre niṭṭhubhitvā yāti.
atk-s0305a2:39_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca. Te kira āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṁ
atk-s0305a2:39_1: katikavattaṁ akaṁsu – ‘‘arahattaṁ apatvā aññamaññaṁ nālapissāmā’’ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-s0305a2:39_2: pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā pavisiṁsu. Divasādīsu pucchitesu vuttanayeneva paṭipajjiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:39_3: Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṁ disvā jāniṁsu – ‘‘ajjeko āgato, ajja dve’’ti. Evañca
atk-s0305a2:39_4: cintesuṁ – ‘‘kiṁ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṁ na sallapanti, udāhu aññamaññampi. Yadi
atk-s0305a2:39_5: aññamaññaṁ na sallapanti, addhā vivādajātā bhavissanti. Etha ne aññamaññaṁ khamāpessāmā’’ti
atk-s0305a2:39_6: sabbe vihāraṁ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṁsu. Tato yo
atk-s0305a2:39_7: tesu cakkhumā puriso, so āha – ‘‘na bho kalahakārakānaṁ okāso īdiso hoti, susammaṭṭhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:39_8: cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ, sunikkhittā sammajjaniyo, supaṭṭhitaṁ pānīyaṁ paribhojanīya’’nti
atk-s0305a2:39_9: . Te tatova nivattā. Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṁ patvā mahāpavāraṇāyaṁ
atk-s0305a2:40_0: Evaṁ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya, kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū
atk-s0305a2:40_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṁ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ
atk-s0305a2:40_2: katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0305a2:40_3: vā natthi, taṁ vīthiṁ paṭipajjati. Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya
atk-s0305a2:40_4: javena gacchati. Na hi javena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṁ nāma kiñci atthi. Visamabhūmibhāgapattaṁ
atk-s0305a2:40_5: pana udakasakaṭaṁ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati. Anugharaṁ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṁ vā
atk-s0305a2:40_6: adātukāmaṁ vā sallakkhetuṁ tadanurūpaṁ kālaṁ āgamento bhikkhaṁ gahetvā antogāme vā
atk-s0305a2:40_7: bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:40_9: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti, neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya
atk-s0305a2:40_10: na vibhūsanāya…pe… bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ bhattakilamathaṁ paṭipassambhetvā
atk-s0305a2:40_11: yathā purebhattaṁ , evaṁ pacchābhattaṁ purimayāmaṁ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0305a2:40_12: manasikaroti. Ayaṁ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0305a2:41_0: Imaṁ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṁ gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno
atk-s0305a2:41_1: hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti. No ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti, atha majjhimavaye
atk-s0305a2:41_2: pāpuṇāti. No ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti, atha pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti, no ce pacchimavaye
atk-s0305a2:41_3: pāpuṇāti, atha maraṇasamaye. No ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti, atha devaputto hutvā. No
atk-s0305a2:41_4: ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti, anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti.
atk-s0305a2:41_5: No ce paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti, atha buddhānaṁ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti,
atk-s0305a2:41_6: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā, seyyathāpi thero sāriputto, mahiddhiko
atk-s0305a2:41_7: vā, seyyathāpi thero mahāmoggallāno, dhutavādo vā, seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo,
atk-s0305a2:41_8: dibbacakkhuko vā, seyyathāpi thero anuruddho, vinayadharo vā, seyyathāpi thero upāli,
atk-s0305a2:41_9: dhammakathiko vā, seyyathāpi thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, āraññiko vā, seyyathāpi thero
atk-s0305a2:41_10: revato, bahussuto vā, seyyathāpi thero ānando, sikkhākāmo vā, seyyathāpi thero rāhulo
atk-s0305a2:41_11: buddhaputtoti. Iti imasmiṁ catukke yvāyaṁ harati paccāharati ca, tassa gocarasampajaññaṁ sikhāpattaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:42_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṁ asammohasampajaññaṁ. Taṁ evaṁ veditabbaṁ – idha bhikkhu
atk-s0305a2:42_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu – ‘‘attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0305a2:42_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito’’ti vā ‘‘ahaṁ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito’’ti
atk-s0305a2:42_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
atk-s0305a2:42_4: saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati, iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-s0305a2:42_5: ayaṁ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati. Tassevaṁ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe
atk-s0305a2:42_6: pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
atk-s0305a2:42_7: balavatiyo, tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu, vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
atk-s0305a2:42_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo, tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesu.
atk-s0305a2:43_0: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṁ na pāpuṇanti, tathā atiharaṇe
atk-s0305a2:43_1: pavattā vītiharaṇaṁ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṁ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:43_2: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirumbhanaṁ na pāpuṇanti, tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṁ sandhisandhi
atk-s0305a2:43_3: odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya taṭataṭāyantā bhijjanti. Tattha ko
atk-s0305a2:43_4: eko abhikkamati, kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṁ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṁyeva gamanaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:43_5: dhātūnaṁ ṭhānaṁ, dhātūnaṁ nisajjā, dhātūnaṁ sayanaṁ. Tasmiṁ tasmiñhi koṭṭhāse saddhiṁ rūpena –
atk-s0305a2:48_0: Ālokitevilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṁ nāma purato pekkhanaṁ, vilokitaṁ nāma anudisāpekkhanaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:48_1: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato anupekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a2:48_2: Tāni idha na gahitāni, sāruppavasena pana imāneva dve gahitāni. Iminā vā mukhena
atk-s0305a2:49: Tattha ‘‘ālokessāmī’’ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ sātthakasampajaññaṁ. Taṁ āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā veditabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0305a2:50_0: ‘‘Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā
atk-s0305a2:50_1: nando puratthimaṁ disaṁ āloketi ‘evaṁ me puratthimaṁ disaṁ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0305a2:50_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāsavissantī’ti. Itiha tattha sampajāno hoti. Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-s0305a2:50_3: nandassa pacchimā disā, uttarā disā, dakkhiṇā disā, uddhaṁ, adho, anudisā āloketabbā
atk-s0305a2:50_4: hoti, sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṁ āloketi ‘evaṁ me anudisaṁ ālokayato’…pe…
atk-s0305a2:51_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0305a2:51_1: Kammaṭṭhānassa pana avijahanameva gocarasampajaññaṁ, tasmā khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi
atk-s0305a2:51_2: attano kamaṭṭhānavaseneva kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:52_0: ‘‘Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi, ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne
atk-s0305a2:52_1: teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a2:52_2: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṁ akkhidalaṁ adho sīdati, uparimaṁ
atk-s0305a2:52_3: uddhaṁ laṅgheti, koci yantakena vivaranto nāma natthi, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ
atk-s0305a2:52_4: sādhentaṁ uppajjatī’’ti evaṁ pajānanaṁ panettha asammohasampajaññaṁ nāma.
atk-s0305a2:56_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṁ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṁ sādhayamānaṁ pavattati, taṁ āvaṭṭetvā
atk-s0305a2:56_1: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ
atk-s0305a2:56_2: sādhayamānaṁ, tannirodhā vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā
atk-s0305a2:56_4: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā, tannirodhā sattakkhattuṁ javanaṁ javati. Tattha paṭhamajavanepi
atk-s0305a2:56_5: ‘‘ayaṁ itthī, ayaṁ puriso’’ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṁ na hoti,
atk-s0305a2:56_6: dutiyajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi. Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena
atk-s0305a2:56_7: bhijjitvā patitesu ‘‘ayaṁ itthī, ayaṁ puriso’’ti rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṁ
atk-s0305a2:56_8: hoti. Evaṁ tāvettha mūlapariññāvasena asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:57_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṁ sakakiccanipphādanavasena
atk-s0305a2:57_1: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṁ uppajjati, taṁ pubbe uppannānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:57_2: āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe
atk-s0305a2:57_3: kiñci yācituṁ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:57_4: na yuttaṁ, evaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
atk-s0305a2:57_5: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṁ ayuttanti evaṁ āgantukabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:58_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṁ
atk-s0305a2:58_1: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṁ na passanti, ittarāni tāvakālikāni
atk-s0305a2:58_2: honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṁ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva
atk-s0305a2:58_3: maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma, evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu
atk-s0305a2:58_4: āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi
atk-s0305a2:58_5: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṁ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:59_1: ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho, dassanaṁ viññāṇakkhandho, taṁsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0305a2:59_2: saññā saññākkhandho, phassādikā saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho, evametesaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:59_3: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi? Tathā cakkhu
atk-s0305a2:59_4: cakkhāyatanaṁ, rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ, dassanaṁ manāyatanaṁ, vedanādayo sampayuttadhammā
atk-s0305a2:59_5: dhammāyatanaṁ, evametesaṁ catunnaṁ āyatanānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a2:59_6: Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi? Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṁ rūpadhātu, dassanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:59_7: cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṁsampayuttā vedanādayo dhammā dhammadhātu, evametesaṁ catunnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:59_8: dhātūnaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi?
atk-s0305a2:59_9: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpaṁ ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṁ anantarasamanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
atk-s0305a2:59_10: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātapaccayo. Evametesaṁ paccayānaṁ samavāye
atk-s0305a2:59_11: ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi, ko viloketīti evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenapi
atk-s0305a2:60_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:60_1: akatvā hatthapādānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṁ pariggaṇhitvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:60_2: sātthakasampajaññaṁ. Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṁ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa
atk-s0305a2:60_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti, cittaṁ ekaggaṁ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṁ paripatati,
atk-s0305a2:60_4: visesaṁ nādhigacchati. Kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0305a2:60_5: cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṁ phātiṁ gacchati, visesamadhigacchatīti evaṁ atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:61_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:61_1: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – mahācetiyaṅgaṇe kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṁ gaṇhanti. Tesaṁ piṭṭhipasse
atk-s0305a2:61_2: daharabhikkhuniyo dhammaṁ suṇanti. Tattheko daharo hatthaṁ pasārento kāyasaṁsaggaṁ
atk-s0305a2:61_3: patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto. Aparo bhikkhu pādaṁ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0305a2:61_4: aṭṭhiṁ āhacca pādo jhāyi. Aparo vammike pasāresi, so āsīvisena daṭṭho. Aparo cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake
atk-s0305a2:61_5: pasāresi, taṁ maṇisappo ḍaṁsi. Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:62_0: Gocarasampajaññaṁ pana mahātheravatthunā dīpetabbaṁ – mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno
atk-s0305a2:62_1: antevāsikehi saddhiṁ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a2:62_2: saṇikaṁ samiñjesi. Taṁ antevāsikā pucchiṁsu – ‘‘kasmā, bhante, sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā
atk-s0305a2:62_3: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjitthā’’ti. Yato paṭṭhāyāhaṁ, āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:62_4: manasikātuṁ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo, idāni pana
atk-s0305a2:62_5: tumhehi saddhiṁ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā samiñjito, tasmā puna yathāṭhāne
atk-s0305a2:62_6: ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena bhavitabbanti. Evametthāpi
atk-s0305a2:63_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjanto vā pasārento vā natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-s0305a2:63_1: pana suttākaḍḍhanavasena dāruyantassa hatthapādalaḷanaṁ viya samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ hotīti
atk-s0305a2:64_1: bhikkhāpaṭiggahaṇādivasena paribhogo dhāraṇaṁ nāma. Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe
atk-s0305a2:64_2: tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho, ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā
atk-s0305a2:64_3: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma. Tassa vasena sātthakasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:65_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṁ sukhumaṁ sappāyaṁ, sītālukassa ghanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:65_1: dupaṭṭaṁ. Viparītaṁ asappāyaṁ. Yassa kassaci jiṇṇaṁ asappāyameva. Aggaḷādidānena
atk-s0305a2:65_2: hissa taṁ palibodhakaraṁ hoti. Tathā paṭṭuṇṇadukūlādibhedaṁ lobhanīyacīvaraṁ. Tādisañhi
atk-s0305a2:65_3: araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṁ , jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti. Nippariyāyena pana
atk-s0305a2:65_4: yaṁ nimittakammādimicchājīvavasena uppannaṁ, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā
atk-s0305a2:65_5: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti , taṁ asappāyaṁ. Viparītaṁ sappāyaṁ, tassa
atk-s0305a2:65_6: vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṁ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva ca gocarasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:66_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṁ pārupanto natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a2:66_1: pana cīvarapārupanaṁ hoti. Tattha cīvarampi acetanaṁ, kāyopi acetano. Cīvaraṁ na
atk-s0305a2:66_2: jānāti ‘‘mayā kāyo pārupito’’ti. Kāyopi na jānāti ‘‘ahaṁ cīvarena pārupito’’ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0305a2:66_3: dhātusamūhaṁ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya. Tasmā neva
atk-s0305a2:66_4: sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ, na asundaraṁ labhitvā domanassaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:66_5: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṁ karonti, keci
atk-s0305a2:66_6: gūthamuttakaddamadaṇḍasatthapahārādīhi asakkāraṁ. Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṁ
atk-s0305a2:66_7: vā karonti domanassaṁ vā. Evamevaṁ neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:66_8: na asundaraṁ labhitvā domanassanti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:67_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṁ sahasāva aggahetvā – ‘‘imaṁ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:67_2: veditabbaṁ. Kisadubbalasarīrassa pana garupatto asappāyo. Yassa kassaci catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato
atk-s0305a2:67_3: dubbisodhanīyo asappāyova. Duddhotapatto hi na vaṭṭati, taṁ dhovantasseva cassa palibodho
atk-s0305a2:67_4: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo. Nimittakammādivasena
atk-s0305a2:67_5: laddho, pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-s0305a2:67_6: ayaṁ ekantaasappāyova. Viparīto sappāyo. Tassa vasenettha sappāyasampajaññaṁ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva
atk-s0305a2:68_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṁ gaṇhanto natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a2:68_1: pattaggahaṇaṁ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na jānāti
atk-s0305a2:68_2: ‘‘ahaṁ hatthehi gahito’’ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti ‘‘patto amhehi gahito’’ti. Dhātuyova
atk-s0305a2:68_3: dhātusamūhaṁ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0305a2:69_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe
atk-s0305a2:69_1: anāthasālāya anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṁ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi
atk-s0305a2:69_2: bhesajjāni ca upanāmenti. Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni, kesañci thūlāni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0305a2:69_3: bhesajjakapālānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni, kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti, na te tattha
atk-s0305a2:69_4: sumanā vā dummanā vā honti. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahamatteneva
atk-s0305a2:69_5: ca kapālakena tesaṁ attho. Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṁ viya cīvaraṁ, bhesajjakapālakaṁ
atk-s0305a2:69_6: viya ca pattaṁ, kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṁ sallakkheti. Ayaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
atk-s0305a2:70_0: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātabhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjakādikhādane.
atk-s0305a2:70_1: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha ‘‘neva davāyā’’tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi
atk-s0305a2:70_2: attho attho nāma, tassa vasena sātthakasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:71_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti, taṁ tassa asappāyaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:71_1: Yaṁ pana nimittakammādivasena paṭiladdhaṁ, yañcassa bhuñjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0305a2:71_2: kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṁ ekantaasappāyameva. Viparītaṁ sappāyaṁ. Tassa vasenettha
atk-s0305a2:72_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi, vuttappakāracittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a2:72_1: pattapaṭiggahaṇaṁ nāma hoti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:72_2: nāma hoti, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopakaraṇaṁ ālopuddharaṇaṁ mukhavivaraṇañca
atk-s0305a2:72_3: hoti. Na koci kuñcikāya na yantakena hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a2:72_4: ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṁ uparidantānaṁ musalakiccasādhanaṁ heṭṭhādantānaṁ udukkhalakiccasādhanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:72_5: jivhāya hatthakiccasādhanañca hoti. Iti naṁ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo, mūlajivhāya
atk-s0305a2:72_6: bahalakheḷo makkheti. Taṁ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṁ kheḷaudakatemitaṁ
atk-s0305a2:72_7: uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṁ koci kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_8: vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ koci palālasantharaṁ katvā dhārento nāma
atk-s0305a2:72_9: natthi, vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhati. Ṭhitaṁ ṭhitaṁ koci uddhanaṁ katvā aggiṁ jāletvā
atk-s0305a2:72_10: pacanto nāma natthi, tejodhātuyāva paccati. Pakkaṁ pakkaṁ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0305a2:72_11: vā bahi nīharako nāma natthi, vāyodhātuyeva nīharati. Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca
atk-s0305a2:72_12: vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca; pathavīdhātu
atk-s0305a2:72_13: dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca; āpodhātu sineheti ca allattañca
atk-s0305a2:72_14: anupāleti; tejodhātu antopaviṭṭhaṁ paripāceti; ākāsadhātu añjaso hoti; viññāṇadhātu
atk-s0305a2:72_15: tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:73_0: Apica gamanato, pariyesanato, paribhogato, āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato,
atk-s0305a2:73_1: phalato, nissandato, sammakkhanatoti evaṁ dasavidhaṁ paṭikūlabhāvaṁ paccavekkhaṇatopettha
atk-s0305a2:74_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṁ
atk-s0305a2:74_1: akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti, akkhīni bhamanti, cittaṁ na ekaggaṁ hoti,
atk-s0305a2:74_2: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti. Karontassa pana sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti ayamettha attho. Tassa
atk-s0305a2:74_3: vasena sātthakasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ. Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṁ karontassa pana āpatti
atk-s0305a2:74_4: hoti, ayaso vaḍḍhati, jīvitantarāyopi hoti. Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṁ taṁ
atk-s0305a2:74_5: na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṁ. Tassa vasena sappāyasampajaññaṁ, kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavasena
atk-s0305a2:75_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṁ karonto natthi, cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-s0305a2:75_1: pana uccārapassāvakammaṁ hoti. Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṁ akāmatāya
atk-s0305a2:75_2: nikkhamati, yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati, evaṁ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu
atk-s0305a2:75_3: sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti. So panāyaṁ evaṁ
atk-s0305a2:75_4: nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa, kevalaṁ sarīranissandova
atk-s0305a2:75_5: hoti. Yathā kiṁ? Yathā udakatumbato purāṇaudakaṁ chaḍḍentassa neva taṁ attano hoti
atk-s0305a2:75_6: na paresaṁ, kevalaṁ paṭijagganamattameva hoti. Evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-s0305a2:76_0: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Jāgarite
atk-s0305a2:76_1: ti jāgaraṇe. Bhāsiteti kathane. Tuṇhībhāveti akathane. Ettha ca yo ciraṁ gantvā vā
atk-s0305a2:76_2: caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘‘caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
atk-s0305a2:76_3: ettheva niruddhā’’ti, ayaṁ gate sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a2:77_0: Yo sajjhāyaṁ vā karonto pañhaṁ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikaronto ciraṁ
atk-s0305a2:77_1: ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘‘ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
atk-s0305a2:77_2: ettheva niruddhā’’ti, ayaṁ ṭhite sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a2:78: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṁ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati – ‘‘nisinnakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā’’ti, ayaṁ nisinne sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a2:79_0: Yo pana nipannakova sajjhāyaṁ karonto kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikaronto niddaṁ okkamitvā
atk-s0305a2:79_1: aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati – ‘‘sayanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva
atk-s0305a2:79_2: niruddhā’’ti, ayaṁ sutte ca jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma. Kiriyamayacittānañhi
atk-s0305a2:79_3: appavattaṁ suttaṁ nāma, pavattaṁ jāgaritaṁ nāmāti.
atk-s0305a2:80_0: Yo pana bhāsamāno – ‘‘ayaṁ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca
atk-s0305a2:80_1: paṭicca cittassa ca tadanurūpaṁ payogaṁ paṭicca jāyatī’’ti sato sampajāno bhāsati,
atk-s0305a2:80_2: ciraṁ vā pana kālaṁ sajjhāyaṁ katvā dhammaṁ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā parivattetvā
atk-s0305a2:80_3: pañhaṁ vā vissajjetvā aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘‘bhāsitakāle uppannā
atk-s0305a2:80_4: rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā’’ti ayaṁ bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a2:81_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṁ dhammaṁ vā kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati
atk-s0305a2:81_2: sati bhāsati nāma, asati tuṇhī bhavati nāmāti, ayaṁ tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāmāti.
atk-s0305a2:81_3: Evamettha asammohasampajaññaṁ tassa vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā. Imasmiṁ sutte
atk-s0305a2:83_0: 369. Tatiye evameva panidhekacceti so kira bhikkhu kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā ito cito
atk-s0305a2:83_1: ca āhiṇḍati, kāyavivekaṁ nānuyuñjati. Tena naṁ bhagavā niggaṇhanto evamāha. Tasmāti
atk-s0305a2:83_2: yasmā saṁkhittena desanaṁ yācasi, tasmā. Diṭṭhīti kammassakatādiṭṭhi.
atk-s0305a2:85_0: 370. Catutthe dhammavinayoti dhammoti vā vinayoti vā ubhayametaṁ satthusāsanasseva
atk-s0305a2:85_1: nāmaṁ. Samādapetabbāti gaṇhāpetabbā. Ekodibhūtāti khaṇikasamādhinā ekaggabhūtā. Samāhitā
atk-s0305a2:85_2: ekaggacittāti upacārappanāvasena sammā ṭhapitacittā ca ekaggacittā ca. Imasmiṁ sutte
atk-s0305a2:85_3: navakabhikkhūhi ceva khīṇāsavehi ca bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā, sattahi sekhehi bhāvitā missakā.
atk-s0305a2:87_0: 372. Chaṭṭhe sakuṇagghīti sakuṇaṁ hanatīti sakuṇagghi, senassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Sahasā
atk-s0305a2:87_1: ajjhapattāti lobhasāhasena pattā. Alakkhikāti nissirikā. Appapuññāti parittapuññā.
atk-s0305a2:87_2: Sacejja mayanti sace ajja mayaṁ. Naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇanti naṅgalena kasikaraṇaṁ, adhunā
atk-s0305a2:87_3: kaṭṭhaṁ khettaṭṭhānanti attho. Leḍḍuṭṭhānanti leḍḍūnaṁ ṭhānaṁ. Saṁvadamānāti sammā
atk-s0305a2:87_4: vadamānā, attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṁ vadamānāti attho. Mahantaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvāti
atk-s0305a2:87_5: uddhanasaṇṭhānena ṭhitesu tīsu leḍḍūsu ‘‘ito sene āgacchante ito nikkhamissāmi, ito
atk-s0305a2:87_6: āgacchante ito’’ti sallakkhetvā tesu ekaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvā aṭṭhāsi avadamāno. Sannayhāti
atk-s0305a2:87_7: khurappaṁ sannayhamāno viya sannayhitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā. Bahuāgato kho myāyanti ‘‘mayhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:87_8: atthāya ayaṁ bahutaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgato, appaṁ avasiṭṭhaṁ, idāni maṁ gaṇhissatī’’ti ñatvā
atk-s0305a2:87_9: dāruguḷo viya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi, paṭipanno paviṭṭhoti
atk-s0305a2:87_10: attho. Uraṁ paccatāḷesīti ‘‘ekappahāreneva lāpassa sīsaṁ chinditvā gahessāmī’’ti
atk-s0305a2:87_11: pakkhandattā vegaṁ sandhāretuṁ asakkonto tasmiṁ leḍḍusmiṁ uraṁ patāḷesi. Tāvadevassa
atk-s0305a2:87_12: hadayamaṁsaṁ phāliyittha. Atha lāpo ‘‘diṭṭhā vata sattuno piṭṭhī’’ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0305a2:89_0: 373. Sattame duggāti duggamā. Cārīti sañcāro. Lepaṁ oḍḍentīti vaṭarukkhakhīrādīhi
atk-s0305a2:89_1: yojetvā lepaṁ karonti, taṁ makkaṭānaṁ dhuvagamanaṭṭhānanti sallakkhetvā rukkhasākhādīsu
atk-s0305a2:89_2: ṭhapenti. Pañcoḍḍitoti pañcasu ṭhānesu kājadaṇḍakaṁ pavesetvā gahetabbā kājasikkā
atk-s0305a2:89_3: viya oḍḍito. Thunaṁ setīti thunanto sayati.
atk-s0305a2:91_0: 374. Aṭṭhame sūdoti bhattakārako. Nānaccayehīti nānācayehi, nānāvidhehīti attho.
atk-s0305a2:91_1: Ayameva vā pāṭho. Ambilaggehīti ambilakoṭṭhāsehi. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Abhiharatīti
atk-s0305a2:91_2: gahaṇatthāya hatthaṁ pasāreti. Bahuṁ gaṇhātīti ekaggahaṇena bahuṁ gaṇhantopi punappunaṁ
atk-s0305a2:91_3: gaṇhantopi bahuṁ gaṇhateva. Abhihārānanti sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā ukkhipitvā abhihaṭānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:91_4: dāyānaṁ. Upakkilesāti pañca nīvaraṇā. Nimittaṁ na uggaṇhātīti ‘‘imaṁ me kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:91_5: anulomaṁ vā gotrabhuṁ vā āhacca ṭhita’’nti na jānāti, attano cittassa nimittaṁ gaṇhituṁ
atk-s0305a2:91_6: na sakkoti. Imasmiṁ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā.
atk-s0305a2:93_0: 375. Navame beḷuvagāmaketi vesāliyā samīpe evaṁnāmako pādagāmo atthi, tasmiṁ. Yathāmittantiādīsu
atk-s0305a2:93_1: mittāti mittāva. Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā .
atk-s0305a2:93_2: Sambhattāti suṭṭhu bhattā sinehavanto daḷhamittā. Yesaṁ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū
atk-s0305a2:93_3: atthi, te tattha tattha vassaṁ upethāti attho. Kasmā evamāha? Tesaṁ phāsuvihāratthāya.
atk-s0305a2:93_4: Tesaṁ kira beḷuvagāmake senāsanaṁ nappahoti, bhikkhāpi mandā. Samantā vesāliyā pana
atk-s0305a2:93_5: bahūni senāsanāni, bhikkhāpi sulabhā. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:94_0: Atha kasmā ‘‘yathāsukhaṁ gacchathā’’ti na vissajjesi? Tesaṁ anukampāya. Evaṁ kirassa
atk-s0305a2:94_1: ahosi – ‘‘ahaṁ dasamāsamattaṁ ṭhatvā parinibbāyissāmi. Sace ime dūraṁ gacchissanti,
atk-s0305a2:94_2: maṁ parinibbānakāle daṭṭhuṁ na sakkhissanti. Atha nesaṁ ‘satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṁ
atk-s0305a2:94_3: satimattampi na adāsi. Sace jāneyyāma, na evaṁ dūre vaseyyāmā’ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya.
atk-s0305a2:94_4: Vesāliyā samantā pana vassaṁ vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre āgantvā dhammaṁ suṇissanti,
atk-s0305a2:95_0: Kharoti pharuso. Ābādhoti visabhāgarogo. Bāḷhāti balavatiyo. Māraṇantikāti maraṇantaṁ
atk-s0305a2:95_1: maraṇasantikaṁ pāpanasamatthā. Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṁ sūpaṭṭhitaṁ katvā
atk-s0305a2:95_2: ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi. Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṁ
atk-s0305a2:95_3: parivattanaṁ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno ca adhivāsesi. Anāmantetvāti ajānāpetvā.
atk-s0305a2:95_4: Anapaloketvāti ajānāpetvāva ovādānusāsaniṁ adatvāti vuttaṁ hoti. Vīriyenāti pubbabhāgavīriyena
atk-s0305a2:95_5: ceva phalasamāpattivīriyena ca. Paṭipaṇāmetvāti vikkhambhetvā. Jīvitasaṅkhāranti
atk-s0305a2:95_6: ettha jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro. Yena jīvitaṁ saṅkharīyati chijjamānaṁ ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati,
atk-s0305a2:95_7: so phalasamāpattidhammopi jīvitasaṅkhāro. So idha adhippeto. Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0305a2:95_8: pavattetvā jīvitaṭhapanasamatthaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a2:96_0: Kiṁ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṁ na samāpajjatīti? Samāpajjati. Sā pana
atk-s0305a2:96_1: khaṇikasamāpatti. Khaṇikasamāpatti ca antosamāpattiyaṁyeva vedanaṁ vikkhambheti,
atk-s0305a2:96_2: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:96_3: puna sarīraṁ vedanā ajjhottharati. Yā pana rūpasattakaṁ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṁ
atk-s0305a2:96_4: nijjaṭaṁ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti , sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti.
atk-s0305a2:96_5: Yathā nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyuḷhasevālo
atk-s0305a2:96_6: cirena udakaṁ ottharati, evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati. Iti bhagavā
atk-s0305a2:96_7: taṁdivasaṁ mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavaṁ vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṁ arūpasattakañca
atk-s0305a2:96_8: niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṁ vikkhambhetvā
atk-s0305a2:96_9: ‘‘dasamāse mā uppajjitthā’’ti samāpattiṁ samāpajji, samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā
atk-s0305a2:97_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito. Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo
atk-s0305a2:97_1: sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya. Na pakkhāyantīti na pakāsanti, nānākārato
atk-s0305a2:97_2: na upaṭṭhahanti. Dhammāpi maṁ nappaṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānadhammā mayhaṁ pākaṭā na
atk-s0305a2:97_3: hontīti dīpeti. Tantidhammā pana therassa suppaguṇā. Na udāharatīti pacchimaovādaṁ
atk-s0305a2:98_0: Anantaraṁ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṁ akatvā. ‘‘Ettakaṁ dhammaṁ
atk-s0305a2:98_1: parassa na desessāmī’’ti hi cintento dhammaṁ abbhantaraṁ karoti nāma, ‘‘ettakaṁ parassa
atk-s0305a2:98_2: desessāmī’’ti cintento bāhiraṁ karoti nāma. ‘‘Imassa puggalassa desessāmī’’ti cintento
atk-s0305a2:98_3: pana puggalaṁ abbhantaraṁ karoti nāma, ‘‘imassa na desessāmī’’ti cintento puggalaṁ
atk-s0305a2:98_4: bāhiraṁ karoti nāma. Evaṁ akatvā desitoti attho. Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:98_5: ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti, daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā
atk-s0305a2:98_6: piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti, evaṁ tathāgatassa ‘‘idaṁ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭhāne
atk-s0305a2:98_7: kathessāmī’’ti muṭṭhiṁ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṁ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:99_0: Ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmīti vā, mamuddesikoti ahaṁ
atk-s0305a2:99_1: uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko, mameva uddissitvā maṁ paccāsīsamāno
atk-s0305a2:99_2: bhikkhusaṅgho hotu mama accayena mā vā ahosi, yaṁ vā taṁ vā hotūti iti vā pana yassa
atk-s0305a2:99_3: assāti attho. Na evaṁ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmaccherānaṁ vigatattā evaṁ na
atk-s0305a2:99_4: hoti. Sa kinti so kiṁ. Āsītikoti asītisaṁvacchariko, idaṁ pacchimavayaṁ anuppattabhāvadīpanatthaṁ
atk-s0305a2:99_6: Maññeti jarasakaṭaṁ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti, arahattaphalaveṭhanena catuiriyāpathakappanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:100_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ pakāsento yasmiṁ ānanda samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbanimittānanti
atk-s0305a2:100_1: rūpanimittādīnaṁ. Ekaccānaṁ vedanānanti lokiyānaṁ vedanānaṁ. Tasmātihānandāti yasmā
atk-s0305a2:100_2: iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti, tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṁ viharathāti
atk-s0305a2:100_3: dasseti. Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatā dīpaṁ viya attānaṁ dīpaṁ patiṭṭhaṁ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0305a2:100_4: Attasaraṇāti attagatikāva hotha, mā aññagatikā. Dhammadīpadhammasaraṇapadesupi eseva
atk-s0305a2:100_5: nayo. Ettha ca dhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo. Tamataggeti tamaagge,
atk-s0305a2:100_6: majjhe ta-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – ime aggatamāti tamataggāti
atk-s0305a2:100_7: . Evaṁ sabbaṁ tamasotaṁ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda, mama bhikkhū
atk-s0305a2:100_8: bhavissanti, tesaṁ agge bhavissanti. Ye keci sikkhākāmā, sabbesaṁ tesaṁ catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva
atk-s0305a2:100_9: bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṁ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0305a2:102_0: 376. Dasame tenupasaṅkamīti tasmiṁ upassaye kammaṭṭhānakammikā bhikkhuniyo atthi,
atk-s0305a2:102_1: tāsaṁ ussukkāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathessāmīti upasaṅkami. Uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesanti
atk-s0305a2:102_2: pubbavisesato aparaṁ uḷāravisesaṁ. Tattha mahābhūtapariggaho pubbaviseso, upādārūpapariggaho
atk-s0305a2:102_3: aparaviseso nāma. Tathā sakalarūpapariggaho pubbaviseso, arūpapariggaho aparaviseso
atk-s0305a2:102_4: nāma. Rūpārūpapariggaho pubbaviseso, paccayapariggaho aparaviseso nāma sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:102_5: pubbaviseso, tilakkhaṇāropanaṁ aparaviseso nāma. Evaṁ pubbenāparaṁ uḷāravisesaṁ jānātīti attho.
atk-s0305a2:103_0: Kāyārammaṇoti yaṁ kāyaṁ anupassati, tameva ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppajjati kilesapariḷāho.
atk-s0305a2:103_1: Bahiddhā vā cittaṁ vikkhipatīti bahiddhā vā puthuttārammaṇe cittuppādo vikkhipati.
atk-s0305a2:103_2: Kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahitabbanti evaṁ kilesapariḷāhe ca līnatte
atk-s0305a2:103_3: ca bahiddhāvikkhepe ca uppanne kilesānurañjitena na vattitabbaṁ, kismiñcideva pasādanīye
atk-s0305a2:103_4: pasādāvahe buddhādīsu aññatarasmiṁ ṭhāne kammaṭṭhānacittaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ. Cittaṁ samādhiyatīti
atk-s0305a2:103_5: ārammaṇe sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṁ ṭhapiyati. Paṭisaṁharāmīti pasādanīyaṭṭhānato
atk-s0305a2:103_6: paṭisaṁharāmi, mūlakammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṁyeva naṁ karomīti attho. So paṭisaṁharati
atk-s0305a2:103_7: cevāti mūlakammaṭṭhānābhimukhañca peseti. Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesavitakkaṁ
atk-s0305a2:103_8: na vitakketi, kilesavicāraṁ na vicāreti. Avitakkomhi avicāroti kilesavitakkavicārehi
atk-s0305a2:103_9: avitakkāvicāro. Ajjhattaṁ satimā sukhamasmīti gocarajjhatte pavattāya satiyā ‘‘satimāhamasmi
atk-s0305a2:104_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, paṇidhāya bhāvanā hotīti evaṁ, ānanda, ṭhapetvā bhāvanā hoti. Imassa
atk-s0305a2:104_1: hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa mahantaṁ ucchubhāraṁ ukkhipitvā yantasālaṁ nentassa
atk-s0305a2:104_2: kilantakilantakāle bhūmiyaṁ ṭhapetvā ucchukhaṇḍaṁ khāditvā puna ukkhipitvā gamanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:104_3: hoti; evameva arahattaṁ pāpuṇituṁ uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa kāyapariḷāhādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0305a2:104_4: taṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṁ pasādetvā kammaniyaṁ katvā
atk-s0305a2:104_5: bhāvanā pavattā, tasmā ‘‘paṇidhāya bhāvanā hotī’’ti vuttaṁ. Tassa pana purisassa
atk-s0305a2:104_6: ucchubhāraṁ yantasālaṁ netvā pīḷetvā rasapānaṁ viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:104_7: matthakaṁ pāpetvā arahattaṁ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:105_0: Bahiddhāti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ pahāya bahi aññasmiṁ ārammaṇe. Appaṇidhāyāti aṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0305a2:105_1: Atha pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānātīti ettha kammaṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0305a2:105_2: vā sarīravasena vā desanāvasena vā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:106_0: Tattha kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma, arahattaṁ pacchā nāma.
atk-s0305a2:106_1: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā kilesapariḷāhassa vā līnattassa vā bahiddhāvikkhepassa
atk-s0305a2:106_2: vā uppajjituṁ okāsaṁ adento sudantagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassacchidde sutacchitaṁ
atk-s0305a2:106_3: caturassaghaṭikaṁ pakkhipanto viya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā atiṭṭhanto alagganto arahattaṁ
atk-s0305a2:106_4: pāpuṇāti, so puresaṅkhātassa kammaṭṭhānābhinivesassa pacchāsaṅkhātassa arahattassa
atk-s0305a2:106_5: ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:107_0: Sarīre pana pādaṅgulīnaṁ aggapabbāni pure nāma, sīsakaṭāhaṁ pacchā nāma. Tattha yo
atk-s0305a2:107_1: bhikkhu pādaṅgulīnaṁ aggapabbaaṭṭhikesu abhinivisitvā byābhaṅgiyā yavakalāpaṁ mocento
atk-s0305a2:107_2: viya vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena aṭṭhīni pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:107_3: uppattiṁ vāretvā yāva sīsakaṭāhā bhāvanaṁ pāpeti, so puresaṅkhātānaṁ aggapādaṅgulipabbānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:107_4: pacchāsaṅkhātassa sīsakaṭāhassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:108_0: Desanāyapi dvattiṁsākāradesanāya kesā pure nāma, matthaluṅgaṁ pacchā nāma. Tattha
atk-s0305a2:108_1: yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsavasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0305a2:108_2: antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṁ uppattiṁ vāretvā yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṁ pāpeti. So
atk-s0305a2:108_3: puresaṅkhātānaṁ kesānaṁ pacchāsaṅkhātassa matthaluṅgassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ
atk-s0305a2:109_0: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, appaṇidhāya bhāvanā hotīti evaṁ, ānanda, aṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā hoti.
atk-s0305a2:109_1: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa guḷabhāraṁ labhitvā attano gāmaṁ atiharantassa
atk-s0305a2:109_2: antarā aṭṭhapetvāva uccaṅge pakkhittāni guḷakhaṇḍādīni khādanīyāni khādantassa attano
atk-s0305a2:109_3: gāmeyeva otaraṇaṁ hoti, evameva arahattaṁ pāpuṇituṁ āraddhabhāvanassa kāyapariḷāhādīnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:109_4: uppattiṁ vāretvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā, tasmā ‘‘appaṇidhāya bhāvanā’’ti vuttā.
atk-s0305a2:109_5: Tassa pana purisassa taṁ guḷabhāraṁ attano gāmaṁ netvā ñātīhi saddhiṁ paribhogo viya
atk-s0305a2:109_6: imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvā arahattaṁ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:109_7: veditabbaṁ. Imasmiṁ sutte pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0305a2:113_0: 378. Dutiyavaggassa dutiye nālandāyanti nālandāti evaṁnāmake nagare, taṁ nagaraṁ
atk-s0305a2:113_1: gocaragāmaṁ katvā. Pāvārikambavaneti dussapāvārikaseṭṭhino ambavane. Taṁ kira tassa
atk-s0305a2:113_2: uyyānaṁ ahosi. So bhagavato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṁ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṁ
atk-s0305a2:113_3: bhagavato vihāraṁ katvā niyyātesi. So vihāro jīvakambavanaṁ viya pāvārikambavanantveva
atk-s0305a2:113_4: saṅkhaṁ gato. Tasmiṁ pāvārikambavane viharatīti attho.
atk-s0305a2:114_0: Evaṁpasannoti evaṁ uppannasaddho, evaṁ saddahāmīti attho. Bhiyyobhiññataroti bhiyyataro
atk-s0305a2:114_1: abhiññāto bhiyyatarābhiyyo vā, uttaritarañāṇoti attho. Sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe
atk-s0305a2:114_2: arahattamaggañāṇe vā arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti, dvepi
atk-s0305a2:114_3: aggasāvakā arahattamaggeneva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṁ paṭilabhanti, paccekabuddhā paccekabodhiñāṇaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:114_4: buddhā sabbaññutaññāṇañceva sakale ca buddhaguṇe. Sabbampi nesaṁ arahattamaggeneva
atk-s0305a2:114_5: ijjhati. Tasmā arahattamaggañāṇaṁ sambodhi nāma hoti. Tena uttaritaro ca bhagavatā
atk-s0305a2:115_0: Uḷārāti seṭṭhā. Ayañhi uḷārasaddo ‘‘uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni.
atk-s0305a2:115_1: 1.366) madhure āgacchati. ‘‘Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṁ vacchāyano samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsāya
atk-s0305a2:115_3: ni. 2.32; ma. ni. 3.201) vipule. Svāyamidha seṭṭhe āgato. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘uḷārāti seṭṭhā’’ti.
atk-s0305a2:115_4: Āsabhīti usabhassa vācāsadisī acalā asampavedhī. Ekaṁso gahitoti anussavena vā ācariyaparamparāya
atk-s0305a2:115_5: vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena vā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā
atk-s0305a2:115_6: vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viya ekaṁso
atk-s0305a2:115_7: gahito, sanniṭṭhānakathāva kathitāti attho. Sīhanādoti seṭṭhanādo, vane unnādayantena
atk-s0305a2:116_0: Kiṁnu te sāriputtāti imaṁ desanaṁ kasmā ārabhi? Anuyogadāpanatthaṁ. Ekacco hi sīhanādaṁ
atk-s0305a2:116_1: naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti, nighaṁsanaṁ na khamati, silese
atk-s0305a2:116_2: patitamakkaṭo viya hoti. Yathā dhamamānaṁ aparisuddhaṁ lohaṁ jhāyitvā aṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0305a2:116_3: evaṁ jhāmaṅgāro viya hoti. Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṁ dāpiyamāno dātuṁ sakkoti, nighaṁsanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:116_4: khamati , dhamamānaṁ niddosajātarūpaṁ viya adhikataraṁ sobhati, tādiso thero. Tena
atk-s0305a2:116_5: naṁ bhagavā ‘‘anuyogakkhamo aya’’nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṁ imaṁ desanaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a2:117_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā. Evaṁsīlāti maggasīlena phalasīlena lokiyalokuttarasīlena
atk-s0305a2:117_1: evaṁsīlā. Evaṁdhammāti ettha samādhipakkhā dhammā adhippetā, maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā
atk-s0305a2:117_2: lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā evaṁsamādhīti attho. Evaṁpaññāti maggapaññādivaseneva
atk-s0305a2:117_3: evaṁpaññā. Evaṁvihārinoti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṁ dhammānaṁ gahitattā
atk-s0305a2:117_4: vihāro gahitopi puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhatīti ce. Therena idaṁ gahitameva. Idañhi
atk-s0305a2:117_5: nirodhasamāpattidīpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tasmā evaṁ nirodhasamāpattivihārino te bhagavanto
atk-s0305a2:118_0: Evaṁvimuttāti ettha vikkhambhanavimutti, tadaṅgavimutti, samucchedavimutti, paṭipassaddhivimutti,
atk-s0305a2:118_1: nissaraṇavimuttīti pañcavidhā vimutti. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṁ vikkhambhitehi
atk-s0305a2:118_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti. Aniccānupassanādikā
atk-s0305a2:118_3: satta anupassanā sayaṁ tassa tassa paccanīkavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā
atk-s0305a2:118_4: tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti. Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṁ samucchinnehi kilesehi
atk-s0305a2:118_5: vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena
atk-s0305a2:118_6: kilesānaṁ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā paṭipassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti. Nibbānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:118_7: sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ.
atk-s0305a2:118_8: Iti imāsaṁ pañcannaṁ vimuttīnaṁ vasena evaṁ vimuttāti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a2:119_0: Kiṁpana te sāriputta ye te bhavissantīti atītā tāva niruddhā apaṇṇattikabhāvaṁ gatā
atk-s0305a2:119_1: dīpasikhā viya nibbutā, evaṁ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṁ gate tvaṁ kathaṁ jānissasi,
atk-s0305a2:119_2: anāgatabuddhānaṁ pana guṇā kiṁ tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:120_0: Kiṁ pana tyāhaṁ sāriputta etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā, te
atk-s0305a2:120_1: kathaṁ jānissasi. Tesañhi jānanaṁ apade ākāse padadassanaṁ viya hoti. Idāni mayā
atk-s0305a2:120_2: saddhiṁ ekavihāre vasasi, ekato bhikkhāya carasi, dhammadesanākāle dakkhiṇapasse
atk-s0305a2:120_3: nisīdasi, kiṁ pana mayhaṁ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto
atk-s0305a2:120_4: evamāha. Thero pana pucchitapucchite ‘‘no hetaṁ bhante’’ti paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0305a2:121_0: Therassa ca viditampi atthi, aviditampi. Kiṁ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṁ karoti,
atk-s0305a2:121_1: aviditaṭṭhāneti? Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti, aviditaṭṭhāneyeva karoti. Thero kira anuyoge
atk-s0305a2:121_2: āraddhe evaṁ aññāsi ‘‘nāyaṁ anuyogo sāvakapāramīñāṇe, sabbaññutaññāṇe pana ayaṁ anuyogo’’ti
atk-s0305a2:121_3: attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṁ akatvāva aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṁ
atk-s0305a2:121_4: karoti. Tena idampi dīpeti – bhagavā mayhaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ buddhānaṁ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṁ
atk-s0305a2:122_0: Etthāti etesu atītādibhedesu buddhesu. Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṁ ñāṇe asati
atk-s0305a2:122_1: tayā evaṁ kathitanti vadati. Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṁ
atk-s0305a2:122_2: anugantvā uppannaṁ anumānañāṇaṁ nayaggāho vidito, sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva iminā
atk-s0305a2:122_3: ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati. Therassa hi nayaggāho appamāṇo apariyanto. Yathā
atk-s0305a2:122_4: ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṁ vā pariyanto vā natthi, evaṁ dhammasenāpatino nayaggāhassa.
atk-s0305a2:122_5: Tena so – ‘‘iminā evaṁvidho iminā evaṁvidho, iminā anuttaro iminā anuttaro satthā’’ti
atk-s0305a2:122_6: jānāti. Therassa hi nayaggāho sabbaññutaññāṇagatiko eva.
atk-s0305a2:123_0: Idāni taṁ nayaggāhaṁ pākaṭaṁ kātuṁ upamaṁ dassento seyyathāpi bhantetiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0305a2:123_1: yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā, sabbaso
atk-s0305a2:123_2: vā pana mā hontu, corānaṁ āsaṅkā na hoti. Tasmā taṁ aggahetvā paccantimaṁ nagaranti
atk-s0305a2:123_3: āha. Daḷhuddhāpanti thiramūlapākāraṁ. Daḷhapākāratoraṇanti thirapākārañceva thirapiṭṭhasaṅghāṭañca.
atk-s0305a2:123_4: Ekadvāranti kasmā āha? Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:123_5: ekadvāreva eko vaṭṭati. Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi, tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa
atk-s0305a2:124_0: Paṇḍitoti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. Byattoti veyyattiyena samannāgato visadañāṇo. Medhāvīti
atk-s0305a2:124_2: pākāramaggaṁ. Pākārasandhinti dvinnaṁ iṭṭhakānaṁ apagataṭṭhānaṁ. Pākāravivaranti
atk-s0305a2:124_3: pākārassa chinnaṭṭhānaṁ. Cetaso upakkileseti pañcanīvaraṇā cittaṁ upakkilissanti
atk-s0305a2:124_4: kiliṭṭhaṁ karonti upatāpenti viheṭhenti, tasmā ‘‘cetaso upakkilesā’’ti vuccanti.
atk-s0305a2:124_5: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṁ na denti,
atk-s0305a2:124_6: tasmā ‘‘paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā’’ti vuccanti. Supatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0305a2:124_7: suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā hutvā. Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena
atk-s0305a2:124_8: bhāvetvā. Anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ paṭivijjhiṁsūti dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:125_0: Apicettha satipaṭṭhānāti vipassanā, bojjhaṅgā maggo, anuttarasammāsambodhi arahattaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:125_1: Satipaṭṭhānāti vā vipassanā, bojjhaṅgāmissakā, sammāsambodhi arahattameva. Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero
atk-s0305a2:125_2: panāha ‘‘satipaṭṭhāne vipassanaṁ gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti
atk-s0305a2:125_3: gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyya, na panevaṁ gahita’’nti. Iti thero sabbabuddhānaṁ nīvaraṇappahāne
atk-s0305a2:125_4: satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṁ viya nānattābhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:126_0: Idha ṭhatvā upamā saṁsandetabbā – āyasmā hi sāriputto paccantanagaraṁ dassesi, pākāraṁ
atk-s0305a2:126_1: dassesi, anupariyāyapathaṁ dassesi, dvāraṁ dassesi, paṇḍitadovārikaṁ dassesi, nagaraṁ
atk-s0305a2:126_2: pavisanakanikkhamanake oḷārike pāṇe dassesi, dovārikassa tesaṁ pāṇānaṁ pākaṭabhāvaṁ
atk-s0305a2:126_3: dassesi. Tattha kiṁ kena sadisanti ce? Nagaraṁ viya hi nibbānaṁ, pākāro viya sīlaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:126_4: anupariyāyapatho viya hirī, dvāraṁ viya ariyamaggo, paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati,
atk-s0305a2:126_5: nagaraṁ pavisanakanikkhamanakā oḷārikapāṇā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā buddhā, dovārikassa
atk-s0305a2:126_6: tesaṁ pāṇānaṁ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ buddhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:126_7: sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo. Ettāvatā therena bhagavato – ‘‘evamahaṁ sāvakapāramīñāṇe
atk-s0305a2:126_8: ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmī’’ti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0305a2:127_0: Tasmāti yasmā ‘‘na kho metaṁ, bhante, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu
atk-s0305a2:127_1: cetopariyañāṇaṁ atthi, apica dhammanvayo vidito’’ti vadati, tasmā. Abhikkhaṇaṁ bhāseyyāsīti
atk-s0305a2:127_2: punappunaṁ bhāseyyāsi, ‘‘pubbaṇhe me kathita’’nti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha,
atk-s0305a2:127_3: ‘‘ajja vā me kathita’’nti mā paradivasādīsu na kathayitthāti attho. Sā pahīyissatīti
atk-s0305a2:127_4: ‘‘sāriputtasadisopi nāma ñāṇajavanasampanno sāvako buddhānaṁ cittācāraṁ jānituṁ na
atk-s0305a2:127_5: sakkoti, evaṁ appameyyā tathāgatā’’ti cintentānaṁ yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, sā pahīyissatīti.
atk-s0305a2:129_0: 379. Tatiye magadhesūti evaṁnāmake janapade. Nālakagāmaketi rājagahassa avidūre attano
atk-s0305a2:129_1: kulasantake evaṁnāmake gāme. Cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṁ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko,
atk-s0305a2:129_2: taṁ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle ‘‘cundo samaṇuddeso’’ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva
atk-s0305a2:129_3: samudācariṁsu. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘cundo samaṇuddeso’’ti. Upaṭṭhāko hotīti mukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānena
atk-s0305a2:129_5: hoti. Parinibbāyīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto. Katarasmiṁ kāleti?
atk-s0305a2:130_0: Tatrāyaṁ anupubbikathā – bhagavā kira vutthavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā ‘‘sāvatthiṁ
atk-s0305a2:130_1: gamissāmī’’ti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṁ patvā jetavanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:130_2: pāvisi. Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṁ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṁ gato, so tattha antevāsikesu
atk-s0305a2:130_3: vattaṁ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṁ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṁ paññāpetvā pāde
atk-s0305a2:130_4: pakkhāletvā pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā phalasamāpattiṁ pāvisi. Athassa yathā paricchedena
atk-s0305a2:130_5: tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṁ parivitakko udapādi ‘‘buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṁ parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0305a2:130_6: udāhu aggasāvakāti, tato ‘‘aggasāvakā paṭhama’’nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṁ olokesi.
atk-s0305a2:130_7: So ‘‘sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissantī’’ti ñatvā ‘‘kattha parinibbāyissāmī’’ti cintesi.
atk-s0305a2:131_0: Tato ‘‘rāhulo tāvatiṁsesu parinibbuto, aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero chaddantadahe, ahaṁ kattha
atk-s0305a2:131_1: parinibbāyissāmī’’ti punappunaṁ cintento mātaraṁ ārabbha satiṁ uppādesi – ‘‘mayhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:131_2: mātā sattannaṁ arahantānaṁ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā, atthi nu
atk-s0305a2:131_3: kho tassā upanissayo, natthi nu kho’’ti. Sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṁ disvā ‘‘kassa
atk-s0305a2:131_4: desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī’’ti olokento ‘‘mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati, na
atk-s0305a2:131_5: aññassa. Sace kho panāhaṁ appossukko bhaveyyaṁ, bhavissanti me vattāro – ‘‘sāriputtatthero
atk-s0305a2:131_6: avasesajanānampi avassayo hoti. Tathā hissa samacittasuttantadesanādivase (a. ni.
atk-s0305a2:131_7: 2.33-37) koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṁ pattā, tayo magge paṭividdhadevatānaṁ gaṇanā
atk-s0305a2:131_8: natthi, aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti, there ca cittaṁ pasādetvā sagge
atk-s0305a2:131_9: nibbattāneva asīti kulasahassāni, so dāni sakamātumicchādassanamattampi harituṁ nāsakkhī’’ti.
atk-s0305a2:131_10: Tasmā mātaraṁ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī’’ti sanniṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:131_11: katvā ‘‘ajjeva bhagavantaṁ anujānāpetvā nikkhamissāmī’’ti cundattheraṁ āmantesi –
atk-s0305a2:131_12: ‘‘āvuso, cunda, amhākaṁ pañcasatāya bhikkhuparisāya saññaṁ dehi. ‘Gaṇhathāvuso pattacīvarāni,
atk-s0305a2:131_13: dhammasenāpati nālakagāmaṁ gantukāmo’’’ti. Thero tathā akāsi.
atk-s0305a2:132_0: Bhikkhū senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṁ agamaṁsu. Thero
atk-s0305a2:132_1: senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṁ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṁ oloketvā
atk-s0305a2:132_2: ‘‘idaṁ dāni pacchimadassanaṁ, puna āgamanaṁ natthī’’ti pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto
atk-s0305a2:132_3: bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca ‘‘anujānātu me bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0305a2:132_4: anujānātu sugato. Parinibbānakālo me, ossaṭṭho me āyusaṅkhāro’’ti. Buddhā pana yasmā
atk-s0305a2:132_5: ‘‘parinibbāhī’’ti vutte maraṇavaṇṇaṁ saṁvaṇṇentīti, ‘‘mā parinibbāhī’’ti vutte vaṭṭassa
atk-s0305a2:132_6: guṇaṁ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṁ āropessanti, tasmā tadubhayampi na vadanti.
atk-s0305a2:132_7: Tena naṁ bhagavā – ‘‘kattha parinibbāyissasi sāriputtā’’ti vatvā – ‘‘atthi, bhante,
atk-s0305a2:132_8: magadhesu nālakagāme jātovarako, tatthāhaṁ parinibbāyissāmī’’ti vutte – ‘‘yassa dāni
atk-s0305a2:132_9: tvaṁ, sāriputta, kālaṁ maññasi, idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṁ tādisassa
atk-s0305a2:132_10: bhikkhuno dassanaṁ dullabhaṁ bhavissati, desehi nesaṁ dhamma’’nti āha.
atk-s0305a2:133_0: Thero – ‘‘satthā mayhaṁ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṁ dhammadesanaṁ paccāsīsatī’’ti ñatvā
atk-s0305a2:133_1: bhagavantaṁ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṁ ākāsaṁ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a2:133_2: puna dvitālappamāṇaṁ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi, etenupāyena sattatālappamāṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:133_3: abbhuggantvā anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṁ ārabhi. Dissamānenapi
atk-s0305a2:133_4: kāyena katheti, adissamānenapi. Uparimena vā heṭṭhimena vā upaḍḍhakāyena katheti
atk-s0305a2:133_5: adissamānenapi dissamānenapi, kālena candavaṇṇaṁ dasseti, kālena sūriyavaṇṇaṁ, kālena
atk-s0305a2:133_6: pabbatavaṇṇaṁ, kālena samuddavaṇṇaṁ, kālena cakkavattirājā hoti, kālena vessavaṇamahārājā,
atk-s0305a2:133_7: kālena sakko devarājā, kālena mahābrahmāti evaṁ anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento
atk-s0305a2:133_8: dhammakathaṁ kathesi. Sakalanagaraṁ sannipati. Thero oruyha dasabalassa pāde vanditvā
atk-s0305a2:133_9: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṁ satthā āha – ‘‘ko nāmo ayaṁ sāriputta dhammapariyāyo’’ti. Sīhavikīḷito
atk-s0305a2:133_10: nāma, bhanteti. Taggha, sāriputta, sīhavikīḷito taggha, sāriputta, sīhavikīḷitoti.
atk-s0305a2:134_0: Thero alattakavaṇṇe hatthe pasāretvā satthu suvaṇṇakacchapasadise pāde gopphakesu
atk-s0305a2:134_1: gahetvā – ‘‘bhante, imesaṁ pādānaṁ vandanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ
atk-s0305a2:134_2: pāramiyo pūritā, so me manoratho matthakaṁ patto, ito dāni paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0305a2:134_3: na puna ekaṭṭhāne sannipāto samāgamo atthi, chinno esa vissāso, anekehi buddhasatasahassehi
atk-s0305a2:134_4: paviṭṭhaṁ ajaraṁ amaraṁ khemaṁ sukhaṁ sītalaṁ abhayaṁ nibbānapuraṁ pavisissāmi, sace
atk-s0305a2:134_5: me kiñci kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā na rocetha, khamatha taṁ bhagavā, gamanakālo mayha’’nti.
atk-s0305a2:134_6: Khamāmi te, sāriputta, na kho pana te kiñci kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā mayhaṁ aruccanakaṁ
atk-s0305a2:134_7: atthi, yassa dāni tvaṁ, sāriputta, kālaṁ maññasīti.
atk-s0305a2:135_0: Iti bhagavatā anuññātasamanantaraṁ satthu pāde vanditvā uṭṭhitamatte āyasmante sāriputte
atk-s0305a2:135_2: na sakkomī’’ti vadantī viya ekappahāreneva viravamānā mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantā
atk-s0305a2:135_3: akampi, ākāse devadundubhiyo phaliṁsu, mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṁ vassi.
atk-s0305a2:136_1: gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi. Thero tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā
atk-s0305a2:136_3: pādamūle nipajjitvā tumhākaṁ dassanaṁ patthesiṁ, sā me patthanā samiddhā, diṭṭhā
atk-s0305a2:136_4: tumhe, taṁ paṭhamadassanaṁ, idaṁ pacchimadassanaṁ. Puna tumhākaṁ dassanaṁ natthī’’ti
atk-s0305a2:136_5: vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṁ añjaliṁ paggayha yāva dassanavisayā abhimukhova
atk-s0305a2:136_6: paṭikkamitvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Puna mahāpathavī dhāretuṁ asakkontī udakapariyantaṁ katvā akampi.
atk-s0305a2:137_0: Bhagavā parivāretvā ṭhite bhikkhū āha – ‘‘anugacchatha, bhikkhave, tumhākaṁ jeṭṭhabhātika’’nti.
atk-s0305a2:137_1: Tasmiṁ khaṇe catassopi parisā sammāsambuddhaṁ ekakaṁyeva jetavane ohāya niravasesā
atk-s0305a2:137_3: parinibbāyitukāmo nikkhanto, passissāma na’’nti nagaradvārāni nirokāsāni karontā
atk-s0305a2:137_4: nikkhamitvā gandhamālādihatthā kese vikiritvā – ‘‘idāni mayaṁ kahaṁ mahāpañño nisinno,
atk-s0305a2:137_5: kahaṁ dhammasenāpati nisinno’’ti pucchantā – ‘‘kassa santikaṁ gamissāma, kassa hatthe
atk-s0305a2:137_6: satthāraṁ ṭhapetvā thero pakkanto’’tiādinā nayena paridevantā rodantā theraṁ anubandhiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:138_0: Thero mahāpaññāya ṭhitattā – ‘‘sabbesaṁ anatikkamanīyo esa maggo’’ti mahājanaṁ ovaditvā
atk-s0305a2:138_1: – ‘‘tumhepi, āvuso, tiṭṭhatha, mā dasabale pamādaṁ āpajjitthā’’ti bhikkhusaṅghampi
atk-s0305a2:138_2: nivattetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṁ pakkāmi. Yepi manussā – ‘‘pubbe ayyo paccāgamanacārikaṁ
atk-s0305a2:138_3: carati, idaṁ idāni gamanaṁ na puna paccāgamanāyā’’ti paridevantā anubandhiṁsuyeva.
atk-s0305a2:138_4: Tepi – ‘‘appamattā, āvuso, hotha, evaṁbhāvino nāma saṅkhārā’’ti nivattesi.
atk-s0305a2:139_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sabbattha ekarattivāsena antarāmagge sattāhaṁ manussānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_1: saṅgahaṁ karonto sāyaṁ nālakagāmaṁ patvā gāmadvāre nigrodharukkhamūle aṭṭhāsi. Atha
atk-s0305a2:139_2: uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṁ gacchanto theraṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0305a2:139_3: vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Thero taṁ āha – ‘‘atthi gehe te ayyikā’’ti. Āma bhanteti. Gaccha
atk-s0305a2:139_4: amhākaṁ idhāgatabhāvaṁ ārocehi. ‘‘Kasmā āgato’’ti ca vutte – ‘‘ajja kira ekadivasaṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_5: antogāme vasissati, jātovarakaṁ paṭijaggatha, pañcannañca kira bhikkhusatānaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_6: jānāthā’’ti. So gantvā – ‘‘ayyike mayhaṁ mātulo āgato’’ti āha. Idāni kuhinti? Gāmadvāreti.
atk-s0305a2:139_7: Ekakova, aññopi koci atthīti? Atthi pañcasatā bhikkhūti. Kiṁkāraṇā āgatoti? So taṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_8: pavattiṁ ārocesi. Brāhmaṇī – ‘‘kiṁ nu kho ettakānaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ paṭijaggāpeti ,
atk-s0305a2:139_9: daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo’’ti cintentī jātovarakaṁ paṭijaggāpetvā
atk-s0305a2:139_10: pañcasatānaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0305a2:140_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ pāsādaṁ āruyha jātovarakaṁ pavisitvā nisīdi, nisīditvā ‘‘tumhākaṁ
atk-s0305a2:140_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṁ gacchathā’’ti bhikkhū uyyojesi. Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo
atk-s0305a2:140_2: ābādho uppajji, lohitapakkhandikā māraṇantikā vedanā vattanti. Ekaṁ bhājanaṁ pavisati,
atk-s0305a2:140_3: ekaṁ nikkhamati. Brāhmaṇī – ‘‘mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṁ na ruccatī’’ti attano
atk-s0305a2:141_0: Cattāro mahārājāno ‘‘dhammasenāpati kuhiṁ viharatī’’ti olokentā nālakagāme jātovarake
atk-s0305a2:141_1: parinibbānamañce nipanno, pacchimadassanaṁ gamissāmā’’ti āgamma vanditvā aṭṭhaṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:141_2: Ke tumheti? Mahārājāno bhanteti. Kasmā āgatatthāti? Gilānupaṭṭhākā bhavissāmāti.
atk-s0305a2:141_3: ‘‘Hotu, atthi gilānupaṭṭhāko, gacchatha tumhe’’ti uyyojesi. Tesaṁ gatāvasāne teneva
atk-s0305a2:141_4: nayena sakko devānamindo. Tasmiṁ gate mahābrahmā ca āgamiṁsu. Tepi tatheva thero uyyojesi.
atk-s0305a2:142_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṁ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā ‘‘ke nu kho ete mama puttaṁ vanditvā
atk-s0305a2:142_1: gacchantī’’ti therassa gabbhadvāraṁ gantvā ‘‘tāta, cunda, kā pavattī’’ti pucchi.
atk-s0305a2:142_2: So taṁ pavattiṁ ācikkhitvā ‘‘mahāupāsikā, bhante, āgatā’’ti āha. Thero ‘‘kasmā avelāya
atk-s0305a2:142_3: āgatā’’ti pucchi. Sā ‘‘tuyhaṁ, tāta, dassanatthāyā’’ti vatvā ‘‘tāta, paṭhamaṁ ke
atk-s0305a2:142_4: āgatā’’ti pucchi. Cattāro mahārājāno upāsiketi. Tāta, tvaṁ catūhi mahārājehi mahantataroti?
atk-s0305a2:142_5: Ārāmikasadisā ete upāsike, amhākaṁ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā
atk-s0305a2:142_6: hutvā ārakkhaṁ akaṁsūti. Tesaṁ tāta gatāvasāne ko āgatoti? Sakko devānamindoti. Devarājatopi
atk-s0305a2:142_7: tvaṁ tāta mahantataroti? Bhaṇḍaggāhakasāmaṇerasadiso esa upāsike, amhākaṁ satthu
atk-s0305a2:142_8: tāvatiṁsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṁ gahetvā otiṇṇoti. Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotayamāno
atk-s0305a2:142_9: viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike, tuyhaṁ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti. Mayhaṁ
atk-s0305a2:142_10: bhagavato mahābrahmatopi tvaṁ, tāta, mahantataroti? Āma upāsike, ete nāma kira amhākaṁ
atk-s0305a2:142_11: satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṁ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṁsūti.
atk-s0305a2:143_0: Atha brāhmaṇiyā – ‘‘puttassa tāva me ayaṁ ānubhāvo, kīdiso vata mayhaṁ puttassa bhagavato
atk-s0305a2:143_1: satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī’’ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṁ
atk-s0305a2:143_2: phari. Thero – ‘‘uppannaṁ me mātu pītisomanassaṁ, ayaṁ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā’’ti
atk-s0305a2:143_3: cintetvā ‘‘kiṁ cintesi mahāupāsike’’ti āha. Sā ‘‘puttassa tāva me ayaṁ guṇo, satthu
atk-s0305a2:143_4: panassa kīdiso bhavissatīti idaṁ, tāta, cintemī’’ti āha. Mahāupāsike, mayhaṁ satthujātakkhaṇe
atk-s0305a2:143_5: mahābhinikkhamane sambodhiyaṁ dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0305a2:143_6: Sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi, itipi so
atk-s0305a2:144_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṁ āha
atk-s0305a2:144_1: – ‘‘tāta upatissa, kasmā evamakāsi, evarūpaṁ nāma amataṁ mayhaṁ ettakaṁ kālaṁ na
atk-s0305a2:144_2: adāsī’’ti. Thero – ‘‘dinnaṁ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṁ, ettakena
atk-s0305a2:144_4: kā velā’’ti āha. Balavapaccūsakālo, bhanteti. Bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātehīti. Sannipatito
atk-s0305a2:144_5: bhante bhikkhusaṅghoti. ‘‘Maṁ ukkhipitvā nisīdāpehi cundā’’ti ukkhipitvā nisīdāpesi.
